scripts.postinstall: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- yarn --pure-lockfile --no-progress --mutex network && node copylibs.js
scripts.update-versions: node version.js && lerna exec -- yarn && node copylibs.js
scripts.build: lerna exec --ignore=generator-talend -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js
scripts.build-cmf: lerna exec --scope=*cmf -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=cmf
scripts.build-components: lerna exec --scope=*components -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=components
scripts.build-containers: lerna exec --scope=*containers -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=containers
scripts.build-forms: lerna exec --scope=*forms -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=forms
scripts.build-icons: lerna exec --scope=*icons -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=icons && lerna exec --scope=*components -- yarn test -- -u
scripts.build-theme: lerna exec --scope=*theme -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=theme
scripts.build-sagas: lerna exec --scope=*sagas -- yarn run prepublish && node copylibs.js --scope=sagas
scripts.extract-i18n: npm run extract-i18n-components && npm run extract-i18n-forms
scripts.extract-i18n-components: i18next packages/components/src -r -o packages/i18n/components -n tui-components -l en-GB,fr-FR --write-old false --fileFilter '*.js' --directoryFilter '!__snapshots__'
scripts.extract-i18n-forms: i18next packages/forms/src -r -o packages/i18n/forms -n tui-forms -l en-GB,fr-FR --write-old false --fileFilter '*.js' --directoryFilter '!__snapshots__'
